author: DarwinJS
body:
Fixes #4617 
Fixes #4511
Change VS code install to use cask
Change OSX to use curl
Update version number by point release.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
@DarwinJS,
Thanks for having already signed the Contribution License Agreement. Your agreement was validated by Microsoft. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
Please make sure that you add a meaningful title per the [contribution guide](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-submission).
Please use the present tense, imperative style for commit messages and title per [Contribution Guide](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/7a8589a8c516c3048b4555415b9ac13a24b6d6ed/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-submission)

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I updated the title to something more appropriate

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: When a PR fixes an issues, please include in the description (not title), `Fixes #1234`.   I've updated your PR description for you.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: LGTM, I'll leave this open for comment for about 24 hours.

title: Update install scripts with minor fixes targeting macOS
